edu.kit.cm.kitcampusguide.testframework
Class Idgenerator

java.lang.Object
  edu.kit.cm.kitcampusguide.testframework.Idgenerator

public final class Idgenerator
extends Object

Utility class to provide a framework so Object-IDs used in testing are unique. Please note that you always use this class to create an ID in order to minimize side effects and that this class only provides unique IDs if you always use it to create the IDs. Also this class does not use any methods, that are subject to testing.

Author:
Fabian

requestMapID

public static boolean requestMapID(int id)
Checks if id is free or not. If the id is free, it will be marked as taken. So if the first call with a specific id returns true any subsequent call will be false.

Parameters:
id - the ID to be checked.
Returns:
True if the ID is free, false otherwise.
